item.title: Indian journalist gives women a voice on climate change
item.description: Varsha Raikwar fights climate change by creating radio content to inspire the rural population to get involved in India. Her special focus: getting women to participate.

item.title: Soccer playing robot: Is it over for Ronaldo?
item.description: This humanoid robot can run, maintain balance and kick a ball like a pro. And it could also pave the way for even more advanced robotic innovations. Will robots outplay humans in the near future?

item.title: Telegram refuses to provide user data of violent neo-Nazis in Brazil
item.description: Telegram refused to provide user data of violent neo-Nazis to Brazilian authorities citing privacy concerns. This raises the question of whether user data should be disclosed if they are suspected of breaking the law.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Telegram, privacy, user data, neo-Nazis, Brazilian authorities, law enforcement, data protection, civil liberties, digital rights, government surveillance, violence
item.media:title: Telegram refuses to provide user data of violent neo-Nazis in Brazil
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Telegram, privacy, user data, neo-Nazis, Brazilian authorities, law enforcement, data protection, civil liberties, digital rights, government surveillance, violence

item.title: The Wagner Group: Russia's Shadow Mercenary Organization
item.description: Uncovering the shadowy world of the Wagner Group: a mercenary organization with links to Vladimir Putin, accused of war crimes and geopolitical meddling.

item.title: Auto Shanghai goes electric
item.description: The majority of cars sold in Shanghai are now electric and that's reflected at the city's automobile trade fair. The EV sector in China is by far the largest in the world and is transforming the entire industry.

item.title: Republicans Release AI-Generated Ad Against Biden
item.description: The Republicans released a video showing fake apocalyptic scenes of a second Biden-Harris term generated entirely by AI. How will AI impact elections in the future?
